text: The following are notable people who intentionally killed themselves in the 21st century (2001–2020). Suicides completed under duress are included. Deaths by accident or misadventure are excluded. Individuals who might or might not have died by their own hand, or whose intention to die is in dispute, but who are widely believed to have deliberately killed themselves, may be listed under Possible suicides. ==Confirmed suicides== ===A=== * Stephanie Adams (2018), American former glamour model, known as the November 1992 Playboy Playmate, jumped from a 25th floor window with her 7-year-old son, Vincent in her arms."Former Playboy Centerfold Apparently Jumps to Death with Son". Associated Press/Snopes.com. 18 May 2018. * Stuart Adamson (2001), Scottish guitarist and singer (Big Country, Skids), hanging after alcohol ingestion.Mike Wade, Autopsy shows star was drunk at time of suicide, The Scotsman, 26 January 2002. * Ahn Jae-hwan (2008), South Korean actor, carbon monoxide poisoningLang, Nancy (23 May 2014). "Sunhee really loved Jaehwan..." Star News.Bae Ji-sook (8 September 2008). "Actor Ahn Dead in Apparent Suicide". The Korea Times. Retrieved on 15 September 2008. * Chantal Akerman (2015), Belgian film director. * Leelah Alcorn (2014), American transgender teenager, walked in front of a truckJohnston, Maura (31 December 2014). In June 2001, he suffered severe injuries in a car crash while on vacation in Ireland. In the crash, Gray, who battled depression and bipolar tendencies, suffered a broken hip, leaving his right leg almost immobilized and a fracture in his skull that left a jagged scar on his forehead, leaving him with depression and a brain injury. During surgery in which a titanium plate was placed over the break in his skull, surgeons removed dozens of bone fragments from his frontal cortex.Dewan, Shaila K.; McKinley, Jesse (9 March 2004). Paddock shot and killed 58 concert goers from the window of the Mandalay Bay Hotel before shooting and killing himself. *Tommy Page (2017), American singer-songwriter, hanging * Ali-Reza Pahlavi (2011), Prince of Iran and the youngest son of Mohammad Reza Pahlavi, Shah of Iran, and his third wife, Farah Pahlavi. After a long period of depression, on January 4, 2011, Alireza died from a self-inflicted gunshot wound. * Leila Pahlavi (2001), Princess of Iran and the youngest daughter of Mohammad Reza Pahlavi, Shah of Iran, and his third wife, Farah Pahlavi. She was found dead in her room in the Leonard Hotel in London just before 19:30 BST by her doctor. She was found to have more than five times the lethal dose of Seconal, a kind of barbiturate, in her system. *Brodie Panlock (2006), age 19, was an Australian waitress from Melbourne who died after jumping from a multilevel carpark in Hawthorn. Her suicide was attributed to serious workplace bullying at the cafe where she worked. Her parents successfully lobbied the Victorian Government to amend the Crimes Act 1958 to include serious bullying as a criminal offence with a maximum penalty of ten years imprisonment. Olympic medalist skier Jeret Peterson shot himself in 2011. * Darrin Patrick (2020), American author and pastor, gunshot * Jeret "Speedy" Peterson (2011), American skier, Olympic medalist; gunshot.News Daily: U.S. Olympic skier commits suicide in Utah He was still reeling from the suicide of a friend named Trevor Fernald, who had died of suicide in front of Peterson in 2005, also from a self-inflicted gunshot. Peterson also had problems with alcohol and depression and admitted he had his own thoughts of suicide—all stemming from a childhood in which he was sexually abused and during which at the age of 5 years old he lost one of his older sisters to a drunk driver. * Randy Potter (2017), American former missing person, gunshot * Josh Powell (2012), American main suspect in the disappearance of his wife Susan Powell, blew up his house with him and his children inside * Slobodan Praljak (2017), Bosnian Croat General, poison. Brother of director Ridley Scott. * Junior Seau (2012), American football All-Pro player, gunshot to chest, he suffered from chronic traumatic encephalopathy (CTE), a type of chronic brain damage that has also been found in other deceased former NFL players. * Oksana Shachko (2018), Ukrainian artist and activist, cofounder of FEMEN, hanging"Oksana Shachko death: Femen founder's body discovered in Paris apartment", by Samuel Osborne, The Independent * Harold Shipman (2004), English family doctor and serial killer, hanging"Harold Shipman found dead in cell". Retrieved 5 January 2015. * Bob Welch (2012), musician and former member of Fleetwood Mac, a self-inflicted gunshot wound to the chest, he had had spinal surgery three months earlier, but doctors told him he would not get better. He was in serious pain and he did not want his wife to have to care for an invalid. * Robin Williams (2014), American comedian and actor, hanging, he was suffering from severe depression prior to his death and was diagnosed with early stage Lewy body dementia * Jack Wishna (2012), president and CEO of CPAmerica, carbon monoxide poisoning * Tobi Wong (2010), Canadian born designer, and conceptual artist, overdosed on pills. * Stephen Wooldridge (2017), Australian cyclist, method not released *Tera Wray (2016), American pornographic actress, drug overdose(14 January 2016). The Korea Times. 6 May 2011 * Lee Thompson Young (2013), American actor known for his roles in films such as Friday Night Lights and The Famous Jett Jackson, and on TV series such as Smallville and Rizzoli & Isles, gunshot,Goldblatt, Daniel (19 August 2013). "‘Rizzoli & Isles’ Star Lee Thompson Young Found Dead". Variety. Young had been diagnosed with bipolar disorder, for which he had been taking medication, and had been suffering from depression before his death. * Fakhra Younus (2012), Pakistani dancer, jumped from building in Rome twelve years after being disfigured in an acid attack, after "endur[ing] more than three dozen surgeries over more than a decade to repair her severely damaged face and body[,]...she finally decided life was no longer worth living." ===Z=== * Bill Zeller (2011), American computer programmer, developer of myTunes, oxygen deprivation due to hanging led to brain damage, taken off life support., due to depression over being sexually abused as a young child * Joost Zwagerman (2015), Dutch writer, poet, and essayistPieters, Janene (9 September 2015). "Netherlands mourns death of writer Joost Zwagerman, 51". NLTimes.nl."Dutch best-selling writer Joost Zwagerman commits suicide ahead of new book launch". DutchNews.nl. 9 September 2015."Joost Zwagerman overleden". Privé. 8 September 2015 ==Possible suicides== Actor David Carradine hanged himself in 2009. * David Carradine (2009), American actor, hanging, however, reported evidence suggested that his death was accidental, the result of erotic asphyxiation. Two autopsies were conducted and concluded that the death was not a suicide. * Elliott Smith (2003), American musician, stab wounds to chest. His death was originally ruled a suicide when his girlfriend, Jennifer Chiba, claimed that she was not with Smith when he allegedly stabbed himself. Investigations since have claimed that Smith may have been having an argument with Chiba before his death, and the situation probably escalated to the point where Chiba stabbed Smith twice. * Gary Speed (2011), Welsh footballer and manager, found hanging. Whilst there was evidence the pressure of management had put some strain on his marriage and he and his wife had argued the night before his death, the official verdict of the coroner was a narrative verdict as he could not be sure the deceased had meant to take his own life. * Jeffrey Epstein (2019), an American financier and sex offender. Found to have hanged himself in his prison cell though the circumstances of his death remain unclear. == References == == External links == * Hollywood Suicides - slideshow by Life * Famous Artist Suicides - slideshow by Life * Famous Suicides Suicides Suicides Suicides in the 21st century *21st century suicide
title: List of suicides in the 21st century
